metadata.title: CVE-2015-8856 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the serve-index package before1.6.3 for Node.js allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a crafted file or directory name.

criterions.comment: node-serve-index: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
